ordered_steps: S2: Identify neutral centers and symmetry relationships
S3: Identify persistence / inertia of state
S6: Determine permitted kinetic outcomes only
S7: State impossible effects due to incompatible configuration

prohibitions: Do not treat energy/force/motion as primary causes
Do not default to Newtonian or signal-transmission explanations
Conservation laws allowed only as downstream descriptions

principle_bindings.name: Geometric Action Principle
principle_bindings.qa_statement: An arithmetic move is a geometric move

principle_bindings.name: No Instantaneous Action
principle_bindings.qa_statement: All effects require positive path-length under admissible generators
principle_bindings.svp_binding: All effects exhibit response latency determined by configuration and subdivision

principle_bindings.name: Scalar-Kinetic Distinction
principle_bindings.qa_statement: Invariants are causal; observables are effects/traces
principle_bindings.svp_binding: Scalar states are causal; kinetic states are effects
